name: Furies & Magazines - Episode 1
description:
Synopsis
"Chain of karma"

Ivan Vinogradov is the victim of a top-secret project that was executed by CIA.

He was on the verge of death after the project was abruptly aborted, but is rescued by a CIA agent named Frank Connery.
For some reason, Frank helps Ivan in various ways.

Ivan lives with nightmares every night because of what he went through in the facility.
The only thing that sooths his pain is the unknown drug he has been using since the project.
However, when the medicine is running low, Ivan wanders through the night to find a replacement.

Features
- Top Down Shooting Action Game with Graphic Novel Style
- Simple, intuitive controls
- Gamepad Support
- Hundreds of high-quality pre-rendered cutscenes
- Classical music by Chopin, Mussorgsky, Liszt, and a variety of original soundtracks



※EPISODE 1 consists of 5 chapters.
※Furies & Magazines is planned up to EPISODE 7.
